channel.title: [Community thread] Pictorium + Ideatorium
channel.description:
Hey; seeing this is for 2 ideas, ill explain his in two parts
[size=20pt]Pictorium[/size]
I saw a thread on another site called "Pictorium", basically twas about 780 pages long and and about 14000 posts in it, the thread was there for people to post all created and edited pictures that they have made, so i thought that this would be good for moparisthebest.com!
[size=20pt]Ideatorium[/size] I find that i am never able to make a good image unless someone tells me the size, theme etc so if people posted their ideas, hoping it doesn't get out of hand i might just edit this post listing their ideas! eg
idea from: ...... size: ..... theme: ...... image link(optional): ..... text:.... text colour: .... etc
So.. Post away
[size=20pt]Current ideas[/size]
[quote="exe626"]http://www.tradepoint.ca/TradepointProductImages/ProductImages/40849_1.jpg Give it the effect of movement, even though it's motionless.[/quote]

Bump. Anyone want this?

It’ll fail.

hah are you part of pdn forums?[/quote]

item.title: [Community thread] Pictorium + Ideatorium
item.dc:creator: @sonny_bill_9 ``jason
item.description:
@sonny_bill_9 wrote:

Thanks for the feadback, that pic seems pretty good, im going to try something with that…
My internets pretty much out now(using a friends for this) so i may not be active for a bit but when i get it back im going to update the my first post and (hopefully) add some ideas… ill add yours now.

exps35:

You put Ideatorium twice.

hah are you part of pdn forums?

Read full topic

item.title: [Community thread] Pictorium + Ideatorium
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

Renders are for gays. Take this stock:
http://www.tradepoint.ca/TradepointProductImages/ProductImages/40849_1.jpg
Give it the effect of movement, even though it’s motionless.

Also, remember: Signatures are not considered art in the real world, they’re small pieces to make your signature space look good. You should try more with larger pieces if you want to seriously improve.

Read full topic

Hey;
seeing this is for 2 ideas, ill explain his in two parts

[size=20pt]Pictorium[/size]

I saw a thread on another site called “Pictorium”, basically twas about 780 pages long and and about 14000 posts in it, the thread was there for people to post all created and edited pictures that they have made, so i thought that this would be good for moparisthebest.com!

[size=20pt]Ideatorium[/size]
I find that i am never able to make a good image unless someone tells me the size, theme etc so if people posted their ideas, hoping it doesn’t get out of hand i might just edit this post listing their ideas! eg
